Awnings with retractable arms

The awnings’ arms can be opened and closed fully or partially, with the fabric remaining linear and in tension at all times. Maximum protection from the sun with minimum bulk. In the boxed version, the awning disappears from view, elegantly protected from the effects of the weather.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container”
